text: The plainer the dress, the greater luster does beauty appear.
author: Edward F. Halifax

text: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
author: Laetitia Casta

text: It's sad when girls think they don't have anything going on except being pretty.
author: Keri Russell

text: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it.
author: H. R. Giger

text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt
